title: Random Game Stop and Quit out
body: Sooo anybody have their game randomly just dc them for like 5+ mins and when you quit you're back at the menu and can hit 'Play' to queue up again? Was playing for 30mins and then bam! No more game..

replies.body: Did you restart your client? Happened to me once and I just had to restart the client and it was all good again. If that doesn't work then go to task manager and end the processor for league of legends. If that still doesn't work then just simply restart your computer.
